hadiths.text: (It was narrated that Abu Hurairah said:"The Messenger of Allah said: 'Whoever offers the funeral prayer will have one Qirat and whoever stays until )the body) is placed in the Lahd will have two Qirats, and the two Qirats are like two great mountains

chapter.ara-name: باب ثَوَابِ مَنْ صَلَّى عَلَى جَنَازَةٍ
chapter.eng-name: The Reward Of The One Who Offers The Funeral Prayer
